features.featureTitle: In `frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx`, update the `BackgroundSphere` fragment shader by replacing the entire `void main()` block with the exact GLSL code provided by the user (including comments), so the shader no longer applies any `edgeMask` or coordinate squeezing and the nebula fills the entire background sphere (sphereGeometry radius 300) without circular borders.
